January 16, 1920.
My Dear Carter:
div1.p:
It seems probable now that I will
go to Peru early in February. Could you go with
us in the same capacity and on the same terms as
our former trip?
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, W. C. Gorgas. Dr Henry R. Carter.
Marine Hospital,
Bzltimore, Md.
WCG-TCS.
Have written to Gorgas telling him
that I forwarded this. Sorry they aren't
going to S. A. a little later, but I judge
you can leave the Fla. work in time
to get really without hurrying. Do
leave it as soon as you can so
